import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv('../input/g2net-new-ensemble/submission.csv').sort_values('id') 
df1 = pd.read_csv('../input/stacking/submission.csv').sort_values('id') 
df.target = 0.65*df.target.values + 0.35* df1.target.values
df.to_csv('submission.csv', index=False)
